name: Host Status
desc: Logging, messaging, and other artifacts highlighting the health of host sensors (ex: metrics, errors, and/or exceptions from logging applications)

name: Application Log Content
desc: Logging, messaging, and other artifacts provided by third-party services (ex: metrics, errors, and/or alerts from mail/web applications)

name: Network Traffic Content
desc: Logged network traffic data showing both protocol header and body values (ex: PCAP)

name: Network Traffic Flow
desc: Summarized network packet data, with metrics, such as protocol headers and volume (ex: Netflow or Zeek http.log)

name: Scheduled Job Creation
desc: Initial construction of a new scheduled job (ex: Windows EID 4698 or /var/log cron logs)

name: Command Execution
desc: Invoking a computer program directive to perform a specific task (ex: Windows EID 4688 of cmd.exe showing command-line parameters, ~/.bash_history, or ~/.zsh_history)

name: Process Creation
desc: Birth of a new running process (ex: Sysmon EID 1 or Windows EID 4688)

name: File Modification
desc: Changes made to a file, or its access permissions and attributes, typically to alter the contents of the targeted file (ex: Windows EID 4670 or Sysmon EID 2)

name: File Access
desc: Opening a file, which makes the file contents available to the requestor (ex: Windows EID 4663)

name: User Account Authentication
desc: An attempt by a user to gain access to a network or computing resource, often by providing credentials (ex: Windows EID 4625 or /var/log/auth.log)

name: Image Creation
desc: Initial construction of a virtual machine image (ex: Azure Compute Service Images PUT)

name: Network Connection Creation
desc: Initial construction of a network connection, such as capturing socket information with a source/destination IP and port(s) (ex: Windows EID 5156, Sysmon EID 3, or Zeek conn.log)

name: File Deletion
desc: Removal of a file (ex: Sysmon EID 23)

name: OS API Execution
desc: Operating system function/method calls executed by a process

name: Logon Session Metadata
desc: Contextual data about a logon session, such as username, logon type, access tokens (security context, user SIDs, logon identifiers, and logon SID), and any activity associated within it

name: Logon Session Creation
desc: Initial construction of a new user logon session (ex: Windows EID 4624, /var/log/utmp, or /var/log/wmtp)

name: Group Enumeration
desc: An extracted list of available groups and/or their associated settings (ex: AWS list-groups)

name: Group Metadata
desc: Contextual data about a group which describes group and activity around it, such as name, permissions, or user accounts within the group

name: Container Creation
desc: Initial construction of a new container (ex: docker create <container_name>)

name: File Creation
desc: Initial construction of a new file (ex: Sysmon EID 11)

name: Cluster Metadata
desc: Contextual data about a cluster and activity around it such as name, namespace, age, or status

name: Container Enumeration
desc: An extracted list of containers (ex: docker ps)

name: Container Metadata
desc: Contextual data about a container and activity around it such as name, ID, image, or status

name: Pod Enumeration
desc: An extracted list of pods within a cluster (ex: kubectl get pods)

name: Pod Metadata
desc: Contextual data about a pod and activity around it such as name, ID, namespace, or status

name: Windows Registry Key Access
desc: Opening a Registry Key, typically to read the associated value (ex: Windows EID 4656)

name: Container Start
desc: Activation or invocation of a container (ex: docker start or docker restart)

name: Pod Creation
desc: Initial construction of a new pod (ex: kubectl apply|run)

name: Pod Modification
desc: Changes made to a pod, including its settings and/or control data (ex: kubectl set|patch|edit)

name: Cloud Service Modification
desc: Changes made to a cloud service, including its settings and/or data (ex: AWS CloudTrail DeleteTrail or DeleteConfigRule)

name: Cloud Service Disable
desc: Deactivation or stoppage of a cloud service (ex: AWS Cloudtrail StopLogging)

name: Script Execution
desc: Launching a list of commands through a script file (ex: Windows EID 4104)

name: Windows Registry Key Creation
desc: Initial construction of a new Registry Key (ex: Windows EID 4656 or Sysmon EID 12)

name: Firewall Rule Modification
desc: Changes made to a firewall rule, typically to allow/block specific network traffic (ex: Windows EID 4950 or Write/Delete entries within Azure Firewall Rule Collection Activity Logs)

name: Firewall Disable
desc: Deactivation or stoppage of a cloud service (ex: Write/Delete entries within Azure Firewall Activity Logs)

name: Windows Registry Key Modification
desc: Changes made to a Registry Key and/or Key value (ex: Windows EID 4657 or Sysmon EID 13|14)

name: Process Termination
desc: Exit of a running process (ex: Sysmon EID 5 or Windows EID 4689)

name: Windows Registry Key Deletion
desc: Removal of a Registry Key (ex: Windows EID 4658 or Sysmon EID 12)

name: Service Metadata
desc: Contextual data about a service/daemon, which may include information such as name, service executable, start type, etc.

name: File Metadata
desc: Contextual data about a file, which may include information such as name, the content (ex: signature, headers, or data/media), user/ower, permissions, etc.

name: Process Metadata
desc: Contextual data about a running process, which may include information such as environment variables, image name, user/owner, etc.

name: Driver Load
desc: Attaching a driver to either user or kernel-mode of a system (ex: Sysmon EID 6)

name: Image Modification
desc: Changes made to a virtual machine image, including setting and/or control data (ex: Azure Compute Service Images PATCH)

name: Instance Creation
desc: Initial construction of a new instance (ex: instance.insert within GCP Audit Logs)

name: Instance Start
desc: Activation or invocation of an instance (ex: instance.start within GCP Audit Logs)

name: Service Creation
desc: Initial construction of a new service/daemon (ex: Windows EID 4697 or /var/log daemon logs)

name: Scheduled Job Metadata
desc: Contextual data about a scheduled job, which may include information such as name, timing, command(s), etc.

name: Scheduled Job Modification
desc: Changes made to a scheduled job, such as modifications to the execution launch (ex: Windows EID 4702 or /var/log cron logs)

name: Image Metadata
desc: Contextual data about a virtual machine image such as name, resource group, state, or type

name: Cloud Service Enumeration
desc: An extracted list of cloud services (ex: AWS ECS ListServices)
